meaningMnemonic: The <radical>soul</radical> in your <radical>toe</radical> leaves <radical>early</radical>. You <kanji>grieve</kanji> and <kanji>mourn</kanji> for your now-dead toe.
readingMnemonic: You decide to <kanji>grieve</kanji> in <reading>とう</reading>きょう. Your toe always wanted to walk in とうきょう, and now you can at least fulfill its dying wish.
